children.name: lbl_tutorialTextPlacement1
children.text: Move the shape with your mouse. Left-click to drop.

children.name: lbl_tutorialTextHold
children.text: Click Hold to save the current shape. Click Hold again to switch it with another.

children.name: lbl_tutorialTextGravity
children.text: When this number reaches zero, gravity reverses and the shapes drop in the opposite direction

children.name: lbl_tutorialTextHourglass

children.name: lbl_tutorialTextPlacement2
children.text: Well done! Make one more Line Clear to complete the level.

children.text: Tap to rotate. Drag to move. Flick down to drop.

children.text: Tap Hold to save the current shape. Tap Hold again to switch it with another.
